workflow.description:
Change vRAM in increments of 25%, 50%, 75% or 100% with option to reboot immediately.
Attribute minMemory sets lower threshold for VM RAM changes (i.e. no changes allowed that will set vRAM below 512MB)
vRAM can be increased to maximum configured host memory.

param.name: targetId
param.description: The Uuid of the VM to modify

param.name: correlationId
param.description: The correlationId for the workflow used for logging purposes.

param.name: targetvCenteruuid
param.description: UUID of the vCenter where the target VM resides

param.name: hotAdd
param.description: Yes/True if Memory to be Hot Added - otherwise VM is shut down and restarted for memory change

attrib.name: waitVRAMTaskPollRate
attrib.description: Polling rate for the task state [seconds]

attrib.name: logProgressofVCTask
attrib.description: Log progess while waiting for the task

attrib.name: reconfigureException
attrib.value: Reconfigure Memory Operation Failed, check the vSphere logs for more details

workflow-note.description: Check vRA VM Exists and try reconfigure
Check vRA Exists and try reconfigure
